name: pleated pashmina
description:
Soft, cosy and generously sized to envelop and protect.
Nonuniform pleated design. 

Colour: light grey stone.

Hand made in London from cashmere/wool belnd.
20% cashmere, 80% wool.

55cm  x 192cm

Hand wash only.
Dry flat.

name: super chunky hand knit scarf
description:
THE DARK GREY COLOUR OF THIS ITEM HAS NOW SOLD OUT however another one can be made with an average lead time of 1-2 weeks. Just email your request to info@asakala.com

Super chunky and warm handknitted scarf in a ribbed pattern.

Hand knitted in the UK.

90% wool, 35% acrylic, 5% Polymide.

Hand wash only.
Dry flat.


Dimensions: 23cm x 175cm
Dimensions will vary slightly from piece to piece.

name: cashmere herringbone
description:
A lighter, smaller scarf suitable for smart occasions as well as autumn and spring climates.
Main body of scarf knitted from luxuriously soft 100% scottish cashmere, with herringbone pattern in a two toned yarn.

Knitted in fine 10gg knitting.

Handmade on London.

90% cashmere
6.7% mako cotton
3.3% polymide

Dimensions: 23cm x 167cm

Hand wash only.
Dry flat.

name: honeycomb two tone scarf
description:
Two toned Italian yarn and black merino wool constructed in a light honeycombed structure.

Hand made in London.

50% merino wool
34% mako cotton
16% polymide

Dimensions: 39cm x 140cm

Hand wash only.
Dry flat.

name: purl pattern scarf
description:
Beautifully textured purl and knit patterned scarf with bell shaped bottom. Long and narrow for double wrapping.

Hand made in London from 100 % merino wool

Dimensions: 8cm x 241cm(circumference)

Hand wash only.
Dry flat.


100 % merino wool.
